name: Moving Back
description:
An innovative puzzle game with rewind mechanics 

You were looking to watch an old misterious VHS casette when suddenly you are in a strange dungeon where after you move for a while you are pushed back and a 'clone' of yourself appears, doing the actions you did, but backwards!

Use your rewinding clone to solve the puzzles of the dungeon and try to understand what is happening.

Use arrows to move and space to interact with objects. 

DISCLAIMER:

Most of the artistic assets are not done by us,  but are instead from payed asset packages that anyone can find online.

From the Eggplant Brigade.... HAVE FUN!

Chiara "Kicka" Sanviti - GameDesign
Mattia "King" Radaelli - GameDesign
Lorenzo "Nain" Tomasetta - GameDesign
Roberto "RobZot" Zotta - Programmer / GameDesign
